md:
giải nghĩa từ "decorative" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Decorative (adjective)

* Meaning: added to something to make it look more attractive or interesting
* Vietnamese: trang trí, mỹ thuật
* Example sentence: The decorative flowers on the table added a touch of elegance to the room.
* Related words: decoration, ornament, embellish, adorn

Decorative (noun)

* Meaning: something that is added to something else to make it look more attractive or interesting
* Vietnamese: đồ trang trí, mỹ phẩm
* Example sentence: The decorative vase on the shelf was a beautiful addition to the room.
* Related words: decoration, ornament, embellishment, accessory

Note: In Vietnamese, "decorative" can be translated to "trang trí" or "mỹ thuật", depending on the context. "Trang trí" is more commonly used to describe something that is added to make something look more attractive, while "mỹ thuật" is more commonly used to describe the art of making something look more attractive.
